node.name: Diva Safe Stereo Headphone MAKE: iBALL
node.description: Not very bad to gift sister a headphone that can provide audio privacy while she can still share the space in living room with mom & dad. Rechargeable, soft buffer form and woofer sound under 85dB does not kill the hearing power of ear and may be that’s why it is in fashion these days as a perfect gift item for girls.
node.content:
1. All I need a headphone; this is one of the pointed statements by those sisters who use to watch everything on their phone.     
2. Not very bad to gift sister a headphone that can provide audio privacy while she can still share the space in the living room with mom & dad.
3. As per health guidelines, earphones are more prone to ear problems because while using them there is no space left for air to reach inside the ear while headphones can also be used while not directly covering the ears.
4. Rechargeable, soft buffer form and woofer sound under 85dB does not kill the hearing power of the ear, and maybe that’s why it is in fashion these days as a perfect gift item for girls.
5. A survey from 100 gift galleries suggests that headphones are mostly favored by teenagers and if a sister is younger then this could be the best buying gift for her.
6. Easy to pair with laptop or mobile phone and provide backup of 5 hours in a single charge.
node.alt: iBall Kids Diva Safe Stereo Bluetooth Headset with Mic Violet and Pink

node.name: Waterproof Smart Watch MAKE: HONOR
node.description: Phone may get out of budget but the accessory like smart watch can be a helpful gift to sister. For a fatty sister it will count the calories consumption, For a nerd sister it can remind the time schedules and for phone holic sister it will catch small time to show important notification directly on hand.
node.content:
1. Usually, gifts that one brother gives to his sister, get stacked inside her cupboard and hardly used on occasion.     
2. We think gifts should be meant for those items which at least used by the sister within 2-3 days of her working so that she can recall the memories of her loving brother.
3. The phone may get out of budget but the accessory like a smartwatch can be a helpful gift to a sister.
4. Match with any dress code, among the favorite colors of girls, and paired with any smartphone, the smartwatch is very much useful like a waist belt.
5. For a fatty sister it will count the calories consumption, For a nerd sister it can remind the time schedules and for a phone holic sister, it will catch small time to show important notifications directly on hand.
6. Girls always buy those things which are in trends and smartwatch is one of them moreover it acts like a digital bangle which delivers information and can be wear at rain without thinking about that it can get pale colored.
node.alt: HONOR Band 5 CoralPink Waterproof Full Color AMOLED Touchscreen SpO2 Blood Oxygen Music Control Watch Faces Store up to 14 Day Battery Life

node.name: Chocolate
node.description: Chocolate feels like a emotional love and very best of it certainly brought smile at face of person. For sister relation with brother states, hard from outside like a physical chocolate and as soon we make move to sense it the relation turns sweeter and sweeter like every melting bite of chocolate.
node.content:
1. Every 7 out of 10 person loves chocolate and this number increase with the girl more often.       
2. Chocolate feels like an emotional love and the very best of it certainly brought a smile to the face of the person. 
3. Healthy for maintaining calories in breakfast, swift mood when eaten at lunch, and ready to go delicious dessert for dinner. 
4. For sister relation with brother states, hard from the outside like physical chocolate and as soon we make move to sense it the relation turns sweeter and sweeter like every melting bite of chocolate. 
5. Ask any girl around in the neighborhood and they say, definitely safer with their brother and in reverse boys show more caring to sisters than their other attachments. 
6. Gifting chocolate to sister is the same, brother shows caring emotion not alone in respect to healthy eating but also memories which only they both shared like fighting for best pillow or accident while learning bi-cycle at their young age. 
7. It's not mentioned anywhere that chocolate can be a gift to only a girlfriend and indeed a festival of "Raksha Bandhan" make it falls when chocolate is given as a gift. 
8. Chocolate perfectly checklist as a gift for "Women Day", "Sister Birthday", "Sister Anniversary" and many other family events. From the world of Chocolates we have selected one of the finest taste and came up with these names: 
9. [Milk Chocolate by TOBLERONE](https://amzn.to/3qMudnj) 
10. [Minis Assorted Chocolate by MARS](https://amzn.to/3aMkub3)
11. [Milk Truffles Chocolate by LINDT](https://amzn.to/3aJXRE8)
node.alt: Toblerone of Switzerland Milk Chocolate with Honey and Almond Nougat  6 Pack Pouch 6 x 100 g

node.name: Pure Leather Handbag MAKE: ZUMBLE
node.description: One can easily say that it is a small briefcase which is hang over arm and carry every required item which may categories under private or personal. This is best gift option for those sisters who are married or use to go office daily.
node.content:
1. For most of the girls above teenage, the handbag is one of the essential things at the time they are moving outside.
2. One can easily say that it is a small briefcase that hangs overarm and carry every required item which may categories as private or personal. 
3. There is a perception that these days handbags are getting obsolete and not favored by working-class of age 16 to 24, but still, if sister needs to go for marriage and party, the handbag is must require the item.
4. This is the best gift option for those sisters who are married or use to go to the office daily.
5. Made with original leather, tint, or dye with purple color which is the second recognized color by girls and can carry around 5 Kg of material.
6. As discussed with many girls, this handbag can be a gift item for the age group 24 to 40 and mostly to those sisters who are married.
